about_the_game:
Downloadable Original Game Soundtrack for Tower of Time by Dawid Majewski.

[Important note: To locate it, head over to the game's catalogue on your hard-drive, where you will find Tower of Time OST folder with audio files in mp3 format]

The soundtrack consists of 32 tracks and more than 2.5 hours of atmospheric music to listen to divided into three sections:

City

C01 The City of Broken Stones (04:52)
C02 Reclaiming the Forgotten (05:36)
C03 Five Minutes of Sunlight (05:46)
C04 The End Day (4:38)

Exploration

E01 Into the Tower (05:28)
E02 Lost Knowledge (05:30)
E03 Among the Friends (08:08)
E04 A Place of Wonders (07:28)
E05 A Candle in the Darkness (05:14)
E06 The Long Descent (05:24)
E07 Tales of the Past (05:40)
E08 A Glimmer of Hope (4:41)
E09 Sanctuary (5:34)
E10 Rest for the Weary (7:18)
E11 Secrets Long Forgotten (5:47)
E12 A Mystery of the Machines (6:19)
E13 Exotic Matter (2:52)
E14 The End of the Road (5:38)
E15 Shadows in the Darkness (5:02)
E16 Tower Avatar Story (2:51)

Fight

F01 Drums of Battle (05:10)
F02 The Swarm (05:29)
F03 The Rain of Steel (05:49)
F04 Strength in Unity (05:10)
F05 Surrounded (04:29)
F06 Always Victorious (05:04)
F07 Against the Odds (05:20)
F08 Defy the Fury (6:13)
F09 The Dark and the Light (5:27)
F10 The Last Stand (6:00)
F11 Proteus' Dark Tidings (5:32)
F12 A New Day Rises (5:31)

short_description: Tower of Time's Soundtrack masterfully blends orchestral and electronic elements to create an atmospheric and immersive experience. From sweeping melodies that evoke the grandeur of the tower to intense combat themes, the music perfectly complements the game's exploration and strategic battles.
